value:
I feel as if I could learn much from
Prince Alfonse and Princess
Sharena—the royalty of this kingdom.

My retainers are Laslow and Peri.
You may find their behavior
questionable.$k$pBut their skill in battle is certain.
Besides, I've lost retainers before.
I don't wish to repeat the experience.

You always look very busy. That
reminds me of a time when...$k$pWell, when one of my siblings began
leading an army. So, mind your
limits. Stay safe and healthy.

I'd like it if you would train with me
from time to time. We don't need to
spar—just do practice swings.$k$pYou'd be surprised how simply
that communicates as well as
words could ever manage.

I often think of my many siblings,
off fighting—and who knows where?$k$pI ask that you treat them well,
should you see them.

Ah, greetings. Are you not
$Nu?$k$pI bring you best regards from your
friend $Nf.

I wish to test my new limits.
To battle!

Fair result for fine efforts. Yet
there's more to do.

This is not sufficient for a future
king.

My gratitude. Still, as a future king,
I must strive higher.

I am Xander, Crown Prince of Nohr,
and wielder of the divine Siegfried.
I hope to see you mete out justice.

Here, take this practice sword,
$Nu. I borrowed it
from Commander Anna.$k$pYou're going to join me for training.
What, don't you want to? I'm not
trying to forge you into a fighter.$k$pI believe that meeting a friend
blade to blade is the truest way to
give voice to our inner qualities.$k$pIn swordplay, you can share your
hopes and fears as our leader and I
can parry with things unsaid.$k$pI wouldn't spar like this with just
anyone. You've proven yourself
worthy on the battlefield!$k$pNow, what say you? Would you
still rather not...?$k$pOh, you'll join me! Well then, know
that it is my honor completely,
$Nu.
むんっ
はあっ！
ぐあっ
Mistake!
Right where I want you!
Prepare yourself!
You're going home—in pieces!
Down on your knees!
The end...
Hmmm.
I take it that you want to chat?
If you want victory, seize it. With both hands!
No matter what, I always make time to practice with my sword. Always.
I know I can be stern, but...in time, I'm sure you'll think of me as a brother.
We must put an end to the fighting here, if only for the sake of my kingdom.
Where are Peri and Laslow? Surely lazing around somewhere!
You are...well liked. Which makes you the second person I've known with such...qualities.
Hmm.
OK.
Let's go.
